description: Creates a presigned URL for an S3 POST operation to upload a file. You can use this URL to set a default file for a FileUploadCard in a Q App definition or to provide a file for a single Q App run. The scope parameter determines how the file will be used, either at the app definition level or the app session level.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the card the file is associated with.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Q App the file is associated with.

parameters.name: fileContentsSha256
parameters.description: The Base64-encoded SHA-256 digest of the contents of the file to be uploaded.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to be uploaded.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Whether the file is associated with a Q App definition or a specific Q App session.

nested_items.name: fileId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier assigned to the file to be uploaded.

nested_items.name: presignedUrl
nested_items.description: The URL for a presigned S3 POST operation used to upload a file.

nested_items.name: presignedUrlFields
nested_items.description: The form fields to include in the presigned S3 POST operation used to upload a file.

nested_items.name: presignedUrlExpiration
nested_items.description: The date and time that the presigned URL will expire in ISO 8601 format.
